title: ASC Coordinator – Remote | Full-Time | $4–$6/hr | EST Hours
job_overview:
We are a physician-led specialty clinic looking for an experienced ASC Coordinator to join our remote team.

The ideal candidate must have hands-on experience handling prior authorizations and eligibility verification for outpatient procedures. Experience in specialties such as pain management, interventional procedures, or vascular care is highly preferred.

Responsibilities:
Manage and obtain prior authorizations for outpatient procedures
Verify insurance eligibility and benefits accurately and promptly
Coordinate closely with surgery centers, providers, and patients to ensure timely scheduling
Work with clinical, billing, and front desk teams to streamline workflow
Track and follow up on pending authorizations to avoid delays

Requirements:
Minimum 1 year of experience with ASC or outpatient procedure coordination
Deep understanding of insurance requirements, authorization processes, and CPT codes
Familiarity with EMR systems (ECW experience is a plus)
Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently
Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

Schedule & Pay:
Full-time, 40 hours/week
US Eastern Time (EST) schedule

$4–$6/hour, depending on experience and performance

How to Apply:
Submit your updated resume to Upgrade to see actual info
Include a short voice recording introducing yourself and describing your experience with prior authorizations for outpatient procedures
